item.description: Commercial car photography
item.content:encoded: Commercial car photography

item.title: Iconic
item.description: This is a self initiated project that has been going on for 2 years. The biggest challenge in technical terms was to preserve the same style throughout even though the four main artists presented here are very different to one another. The whole idea behind this project was to create a style bold enough to fit any music artist without distorting his/her identity.
item.content:encoded: This is a self initiated project that has been going on for 2 years. The biggest challenge in technical terms was to preserve the same style throughout even though the four main artists presented here are very different to one another. The whole idea behind this project was to create a style bold enough to fit any music artist without distorting his/her identity.

item.title: Skol
item.description: Skol was forged in the fire over many months of constant revisions. Our hard work paid off after one week of constantly redrawing letters and changing the form. On or off the screen, Skol is a tenacious, hardy font that would make its ancestors proud.
item.content:encoded: Skol was forged in the fire over many months of constant revisions. Our hard work paid off after one week of constantly redrawing letters and changing the form. On or off the screen, Skol is a tenacious, hardy font that would make its ancestors proud.

item.title: Fake Retro-Future Ads - 2043 Magazine
item.description: This are 4 fake posters commisioned by the guys at Almasty (France) to illustrate a note on the possible future 30 years from now, to be featured in Altavia?s 2043 Magazine. Each one represents an imaginary ad for future products, inspired in the 4 different chapters of the note.
item.content:encoded: This are 4 fake posters commisioned by the guys at Almasty (France) to illustrate a note on the possible future 30 years from now, to be featured in Altavia?s 2043 Magazine. Each one represents an imaginary ad for future products, inspired in the 4 different chapters of the note.

item.title: MagnaGlobal Media Economy Report Vol.2
item.description: Editorial- and Information-Design for MagnaGlobal's second Media Economy Report. MagnaGlobal is the strategic global media unit of IPG Mediabrands. The report provides an essential guide to the state of mobile marketing today, trends to watch for in future, and key insights to unlock mobile media value. The report, the second of its kind from MAGNA GLOBAL, identifies new findings and data-driven insights into the mobile media economy.
item.content:encoded: Editorial- and Information-Design for MagnaGlobal's second Media Economy Report. MagnaGlobal is the strategic global media unit of IPG Mediabrands. The report provides an essential guide to the state of mobile marketing today, trends to watch for in future, and key insights to unlock mobile media value. The report, the second of its kind from MAGNA GLOBAL, identifies new findings and data-driven insights into the mobile media economy.

item.title: voodoo in West Africa
item.description: I photographed many voodoo ceremonies,the temple of pythons, the sacred forest of Ouidah, rites of initiation, the fetish market of lome, masks Zangbeto, egungun, gelede mask,Nigerian masks, fire ceremony in Togo.
item.content:encoded: I photographed many voodoo ceremonies,the temple of pythons, the sacred forest of Ouidah, rites of initiation, the fetish market of lome, masks Zangbeto, egungun, gelede mask,Nigerian masks, fire ceremony in Togo.

item.title: Top 10 Fonts of 2012
item.description: As Dr. Seuss said, How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. And just like that, its time once again for the Top Ten Fonts.
item.content:encoded: As Dr. Seuss said, How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. And just like that, its time once again for the Top Ten Fonts.

item.title: TRANSITIONS
item.description: TRANSITIONS What if you could carry a meadow with you? Grow into the cotton fibres. Get so close so you could become one, but still be yourself. Dilute into it, diffuse, disappear. And become another. Photographs by Dominik Tarabanski Styling / scenography and text Ania Sikorska Photographer assistant Bartek porszke Models Angelika Szelag / 8fi Marta Panasiuk / specto
item.content:encoded: TRANSITIONS What if you could carry a meadow with you? Grow into the cotton fibres. Get so close so you could become one, but still be yourself. Dilute into it, diffuse, disappear. And become another. Photographs by Dominik Tarabanski Styling / scenography and text Ania Sikorska Photographer assistant Bartek porszke Models Angelika Szelag / 8fi Marta Panasiuk / specto

item.title: Latino Influence Project
item.description: We worked with the prestigious agency Grey New York to communicate the value of the Latino community in the United States, from the strong boom that printed the last presidential election victory and the flaming reelection of the President Barack Obama. The challenge was to produce an illustrated infographic showing how Latinos live positively and are integrated in American society, describing the value they generate in different aspects and how they enrich their culture.
item.content:encoded: We worked with the prestigious agency Grey New York to communicate the value of the Latino community in the United States, from the strong boom that printed the last presidential election victory and the flaming reelection of the President Barack Obama. The challenge was to produce an illustrated infographic showing how Latinos live positively and are integrated in American society, describing the value they generate in different aspects and how they enrich their culture.

item.title: Borna&Fils
item.description: Borna&Fils is a French fashion house whose creations embody her vibrant spirit, polished aesthetics and out of boundaries way of thinking. Their designs are flamboyant and common at once, fresh and original with retro references at times. Bunch was in charge of designing the brand and its applications, with logotype designed as a custom version of an Apsasu, a female version of Lamassu, usually associated as a symbol of power with the ancient Assyrians. Identity was applied onto everything from stationery, bags, lookbooks, custom tags, labels, billboards and website to launch event graphics, signage and various in-store collateral for their first flagship store in Venice in Calle delle Ostreghe.
item.content:encoded: Borna&Fils is a French fashion house whose creations embody her vibrant spirit, polished aesthetics and out of boundaries way of thinking. Their designs are flamboyant and common at once, fresh and original with retro references at times. Bunch was in charge of designing the brand and its applications, with logotype designed as a custom version of an Apsasu, a female version of Lamassu, usually associated as a symbol of power with the ancient Assyrians. Identity was applied onto everything from stationery, bags, lookbooks, custom tags, labels, billboards and website to launch event graphics, signage and various in-store collateral for their first flagship store in Venice in Calle delle Ostreghe.

item.title: THE OUTPOST #01
item.description: The Outpost is a magazine of possibilities. It identifies, understands and analyzes the conflicts, morals, energies and opportunities of a changing Middle East and lays down possible futures.

item.title: Infographics: Raconteur / The Times 2012
item.description: Each dashboard highlights interesting aspects of the data and combines this with engaging visuals from the topic. A minimalist approach makes the dashboard easy to read and understand.
item.content:encoded: Each dashboard highlights interesting aspects of the data and combines this with engaging visuals from the topic. A minimalist approach makes the dashboard easy to read and understand.
